Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1978...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Diablo on 4/1/1978 (Going to DIA: RF B. Mingo. Going to PIL: P R. Nuss)...
Injured on 6/6/1979 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 9/2/1979 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Traded from Diablo to Coney Island on 7/22/1984 (Going to DIA: P C. Clutter. Going to CI: RF B. Mingo)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Patrick Twilley (TRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/1985, off Brian Sidney (PEN)...
Injured on 5/3/1988 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 10/3/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/15/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $480,500 per year...
Injured on 6/19/1991 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
